instruction: Describe how technology has improved the healthcare industry.
output: Technology has changed the healthcare industry in a variety of ways, from reducing wait times to making it easier for doctors to access patient records. Electronic health records, telehealth, and AI-assisted diagnosis are all examples of how technology is improving healthcare. Furthermore, many medical-grade tools that once had to be conducted in a hospital setting can now be used in the comfort of the patient’s home. This has enabled medical treatments to be more accessible and more affordable.
